short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Works only with Platina by Formpipe product. Enables opening documents for editing directly from the Platina document server.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This browser extension allows Platina by Formpipe users open or edit documents that are stored in Platina directly from the web browser without necessity to install legacy Platina Client Framework application.
